description.text: The Submodel provides the means to access the Carbon Footprint of the asset.
Balance of greenhouse gas emissions along the entire life cycle of a product in a defined application and in relation to a defined unit of use.
Balance of greenhouse gas emissions along the entire life cycle of a product in a defined application and in relation to a defined unit of use.
Normen, Standards, Verfahren zur Ermittlung der Treibhausgas-Emissionen eines Produkts

Standards, methods for determining the greenhouse gas emissions of a product.

This Value List is based on ECLASS 15 with IRDI 0173-1#09-AAO115#003. The full list can be found in Section 2.5 in "Product Carbon Footprint 1.0 (IDTA-02023)".

If a normalized product carbon footprint (PCF) value is provided, the reference value for calculation should be a specific unit such as 'kWh'. 
If the total PCF value is provided the reference value for calculation should be 'piece'.

If a normalized product carbon footprint (PCF) value is provided, the quantity of measure for calculation should be 1.
If the total PCF value is provided the quantity of measure for calculation should be 1.

List of life cycle stages of the product according to the quantification requirements of the standard to which the PCF carbon footprint statement refers.

The string value in the value list is based on DIN DKE SPEC 99100: "A1 - raw material supply (and upstream production)" (6.3.5 required lify cycle mapping), "A3 - production" (6.3.4 Contribution of main product production/manufacturing lifecycle stage), "A4 - transport to final destination" (6.3.5 Contribution of distribution lifecycle stage), "C3 - recycling, waste treatment" (6.3.6 Contribution of end of life and recycling lifecycle stage)

Please note that the model should always contain at least one Product Carbon Footprint entry that reflects the total PCF value (including all life cycle phases) of the battery.

Document identifier of the document (e.g., PDF) that can be found in the HandoverDocumentation Submodel.

DIN DKE Spec 99100 chapter reference: 6.3.8

displayName.text: web link to public carbon footprint study

definition.text: Norm, Standard, Verfahren zur Ermittlung der Treibhausgas-Emissionen eines Produkts
standard, method for determining the greenhouse gas emissions of a product

preferredName.text: CO2 eq Climate Change - total (for PCF and LCA)
CO2 eq Klimawandel - total (für PCF und LCA)

definition.text: Summe aller Treibhausgas-Emissionen eines Produkts gemäß der Quantifizierungsvorgaben der Norm
sum of all greenhouse gas emissions of a product according to the quantification requirements of the standard
Quantity unit of the product to which the PCF information on the CO2 footprint refers
Mengeneinheit des Produktes, auf das sich die PCF-Angabe zum CO2-Fußabdruck bezieht
Angabe der Stückzahl, Masse oder des Volumens zur Berechnung der Auswirkungen des Klimawandels oder des CO2-Fußabdrucks des Produktes
provides the quantity number of pieces or mass or volume to compute the impact of climate change or product carbon footprint
Lebenszyklusphase des Produktes gemäß den Quantifizierungsvorgaben der Norm, auf den sich die PCF-Angabe zum CO2-Fußabdruck bezieht
life cycle stages of the product according to the quantification requirements of the standard to which the PCF carbon footprint statement refers

valueReferencePairs.value: A1 - raw material supply (and upstream production)

definition.text:
The battery passport must include the carbon footprint performance class in accordance with the entry into force of the delegated and implementing acts on the carbon footprint performance classes per Article7 of the Battery Regulation.

 DIN DKE Spec 99100 chapter reference: 6.3.7

displayName.text: web link to public carbon footprint study

preferredName.text: web link to public carbon footprint study

definition.text:
One or more document identifiers (depending, for example, on the translation) of a specific document, which can be found in the 'HandoverDocumentation' model.

 DIN DKE Spec 99100 chapter reference: 6.3.8
Alphanumerische Zeichenfolge, die ein Dokument eindeutig identifiziert.
Alphanumeric character sequence uniquely identifying a document.
